Create spatial sf object from start and end point of line transects with eastings and northings

fcn_line_transect_sf.Rd

Create spatial sf object from start and end point of line transects with eastings and northings

Usage

fcn_line_transect_sf(
  lineTransect,
  colnames = list(Start_Eastings = "Start_Eastings", Start_Northings = "Start_Northings",
    End_Eastings = "End_Eastings", End_Northings = "End_Northings"),
  start_point = F
)

Arguments

lineTransect

A dataframe with columns of Start_Eastings, Start_Northings, End_Eastings, and End_Northings

colnames

A list with items Start_Eastings, Start_Northings, End_Eastings, and End_Northings, which are strings corresponding to the column name

start_point

A boolean indicating whether the output sf should be just the start points, or the whole table
